The search bar is for connected Sites. In the 2nd pic there are no sites connected so you can't search anything. Since I connected to a few sites like here in Zerotalk the search bar is consistent.

For starters you can follow the news feed here to activate the searchbar
But I know what you mean I guess. Whats missing in ZeroNet is a search engine to find interesting Sites to follow.
